steps.name: User launch the application
User selects the flight option to travel
User checks on round trip as option
User enter "Chennai, India" as source city
User enter "Delhi, India" as destination city
User enter the departure date
User enter the return date
User click on the search button
User navigates to Flight details page

steps.name: user view number of flights with unordered
User filter the low to high option from the drop down
User counts the number of flights in the filtered list
User retrieves price details from each flight
User select the fastest flight from the filtered list
User select the evening flight if duplicate set of lowest price and fastest flight
User verifies that the selected option is lowest and fastest
